interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2014/05/02
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Robert Singer', 'Philip Sgriccia', 'John F. Showalter', 'Thomas J. Wright', 'Kim Manners', 'Charles Beeson', 'Guy Norman Bee', 'Richard Speight Jr.', 'Mike Rohl', 'Steve Boyum'], 'Producers': ['Not Specified'], 'Starring': ['Jared Padalecki', 'Jensen Ackles', 'Misha Collins']}
Review Text: Season Nine rocked!  My two favorite hunters live up to their reputation.  I mean come on it's Sam and Dean!  Do I really need to say more?  The President of Hell, Crowley added into the mix and it's just non-stop entertainment.
Review Title: Sam and Dean!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
